meanings.definition: Divided into many parts or branches.
meanings.sent1: The polychotomous tree had numerous branches reaching out in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The polychotomous puzzle was challenging to put together due to its many pieces.
meanings.sent3: The polychotomous cake had so many layers that it looked like a tower of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her polychotomous thoughts were like a tangled web, making it hard to focus on one idea.
meanings.sent5: The polychotomous map displayed all the different routes one could take to reach the destination.

meanings.definition: Having many different aspects or elements.
meanings.sent1: The polychotomous movie had a mix of action, comedy, and drama.
meanings.sent2: Her polychotomous personality made her interesting to be around as she had many hobbies and interests.
meanings.sent3: The polychotomous wardrobe had clothes for every occasion, from casual to formal.
meanings.sent4: The polychotomous painting captured various emotions, from joy to sorrow, in one masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The polychotomous menu offered a wide range of dishes, satisfying every diner's taste preferences.
